item.title: How to make spatial joins (point in polygon)?
item.description: library(R.utils) library(rgdal) library(tidyverse) library(leaflet) library(sp) library(sf) library(rgbif) library(DBI) What we want to do In this short tutorial, we explore various options to deal with the situation where we have (1) a spatially referenced GIS file with polygons and (2) a spatially referenced set of points that overlaps with the GIS polygons. Typically, both data sources contain information (apart from the spatial locations) that needs to be related to each other in some way.
